title: Deimos no Hanayome: Ran no Kumikyoku (Bride of Deimos)
synopsis: Two siblings were happy on Mt. Olympus, until they fell in love. Deimo's sister Venus got imprisoned in the Swamp of Death. To save Venus's life, he must find a human reincarnation so that they can continue their love.
voices: ['Nozawa, Nachi', 'Shou, Mayumi', 'Shiozawa, Kaneto', 'Fujita, Toshiko', 'Kusao, Takeshi', 'Mutou, Reiko']
staff: [['Rintaro', ['Director']], ['Hamasaki, Hiroshi', ['Character Design', ' Key Animation', ' Animation Director']], ['Oga, Kazuo', ['Background Art']], ['Nakura, Yasuhiro', ['Key Animation']]]
